index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for the implementation of the Fourth Year Community Development Block Grant Program commencing on April 1, 1978; providing certain personnel adjustments and additional budget authority for the Community Development Block Grant Program effective January 1, 1978; establishing certain positions in the Executive Department - Office of Policy Planning and Personnel Services - Public Employment, Department of Community Development, Department of Parks and Recreation, Department of Building and Public Health Department; abrogating certain positions in the Office of Policy Planning, increasing expenditure allowances for certain objects of expenditure in the 1978 budgets of said departments and the Department of Human Resources; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
